solid-extension-data-handling-form.title: Data handling
solid-extension-data-handling-form.label: Load data from database and file system instead of Meta CDN
solid-extension-data-handling-form.alert: This feature will reduce API requests and ensure GDPR compliancy, if no external file systems are being used. Current data from Instagram is synced every 5 minutes. Setup of a CLI worker is required to regularly execute scheduled tasks in the background. For more information see documentation. To enable manual synchronization, the setting must first be saved.
